name: RUMSNEAKEN
description:
The player controls a Pirate or a Parrot who needs to solve positional & detection puzzles, while solving the puzzles the player should avoid being caught by the enemy or if he’s seen by the enemy, hide and wait until the alarm blows over, in order to get back to your main ship and acquire your freedom and win the game.

2-Player mode only with controllers 

Walk around (WASD) 

Kill/Chokehold: L-Shift 

Interact (with Barrels, chests): Q
